title: Hollywood Producer Arrested For 'Fitting The Description'
teaser: Charles Belk was arrested on his way to feed a parking meter, and held for six hours on suspicion of armed robbery.
contentencoded:
On his way to add time to his parking meter last Friday, television producer Charles Belk was arrested on suspicion of armed robbery and held for six hours by Beverly Hills police.

Belk was eventually released after police determined he was not the culprit, and since then, he has been speaking out against his mistreatment, writing on his Facebook page that police had misidentified him as “the wrong ‘tall, bald-head, black male.’”
